title: Fix missing bash language in highlight.js bundle
description: Console error on docs site: 'Could not find the language bash, did you forget to load/include a language module?' at code-block.js:493. The highlight.js bundle needs to include bash/shell language support. Check src/code-block.js hljs configuration and ensure bash is in the language list.
close_reason: Added bash, python, and typescript language imports and registrations to highlight.js bundle
